column5: TYME why cant Tyme provide a clear easy to follow game plan summary of where they are at currently and where they hope to be ie milestones etc Why not something to the following Trials completed What date started ending Number of patients Results Current trials type of trial number of patients start date results to date next date for results expected length of trial Ie number of months left in trial New Trials planned Type of trial Expected number of patients Expected length of trial Will new trials be funded by Tyme or will they have a sponsor Financials How much cash on hand How long will current cash on hand be expected to last How much additional money will be Expected to raise Why cant Tyme provide a simple summary of things to date then some milestones or projections of future plans Tyme has very poor communications It is very frustrating to be invested in the Co Can anyone answer my questionsShow More
